description: Retrieves the Amazon Inspector status of multiple Amazon Web Services accounts within your environment.

nested_items.name: accounts
nested_items.description: An array of objects that provide details on the status of Amazon Inspector for each of the requested accounts.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: resourceState
nested_items.description: An object detailing which resources Amazon Inspector is enabled to scan for the account.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code explaining why the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message received when the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of Amazon Inspector for the account.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code explaining why the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message received when the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of Amazon Inspector for the account.

nested_items.description: The error code explaining why the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message received when the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of Amazon Inspector for the account.

nested_items.name: lambdaCode
nested_items.description: An object that described the state of Amazon Inspector scans for an account.

nested_items.description: The error code explaining why the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: status

nested_items.name: failedAccounts
nested_items.description: An array of objects detailing any accounts that failed to enable Amazon Inspector and why.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code explaining why the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message received when the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: resourceStatus
nested_items.description: An object detailing which resources Amazon Inspector is enabled to scan for the account.

nested_items.name: ec2
nested_items.description: The status of Amazon Inspector scanning for Amazon EC2 resources.

nested_items.name: ecr
nested_items.description: The status of Amazon Inspector scanning for Amazon ECR resources.

nested_items.name: lambda
nested_items.description: The status of Amazon Inspector scanning for Amazon Web Services Lambda function.

nested_items.name: lambdaCode
nested_items.description: The status of Amazon Inspector scanning for custom application code for Amazon Web Services Lambda functions.

nested_items.description: The status of Amazon Inspector for the account.
